rules_text:
Wither [i](This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)[/i]
Whenever one or more counters are removed from another permanent or player or one or more -1/-1 counters or poison counters are placed on another permanent or player, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. This ability triggers only once each turn.
notes:
Needs_Art

Rank 3 - I don't necessarily think this is busted, but it's very wordy. If we cut the couple of poison cards, we can take that line out at least.
